name: pulsemcp-cms-admin-mcp-server
description: Internal MCP server for managing PulseMCP's content management system
author: PulseMCP

scripts.ci:install: npm install && cd shared && npm install && cd ../local && npm install && cd ../../../libs/test-mcp-client && npm install
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd local && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.build: cd shared && npm run build && cd ../local && npm run build
scripts.build:test: cd shared && npm run build && cd ../local && npm run build && cd ../../../libs/test-mcp-client && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run build:test && node scripts/run-vitest.js run
scripts.test:integration: npm run build:test && node scripts/run-vitest.js run -c vitest.config.integration.ts && npm run clean
scripts.test:all: npm run test:run && npm run test:integration
